title: Caribbean Pirate Treasure
resume: Follow Philippe and Ashlan Cousteau as they explore the Caribbean by boat, investigating legends of lost treasure and pirates' plunder. Their adventures take them to some of the most beautiful destinations in the world. In each episode, Philippe and Ashlan dive into a different mystery, meet passionate locals and reveal the truth about some of history's most enduring legends.
